text: Egh ia kamaghɨn fogham, Godɨn gavgavim zurara en navibar aven ikia ingara en akurvasi, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itiba. Gavgavir kam, guizbangɨra bar ekefe, e guizbangɨra an gavgavim tuisɨva avegham. Gavgavir en aven ingarir kamra, dughiar Krais ovengezimɨn, God gavgavir kamɨn Krais gamizɨ, a ua dɨkafi. Egha a inigha uan Nguibamɨn ghua a isa uan agharir guvimɨn amadaghan anefa.
